Sponsorship benefits

There are three types of sponsorship packages; Platinum, Gold, and Silver.
Benefits are granted pre the event, at event and post the event.

  • Pre Event Packages
  • At Event Packages
  • Post Event Packages

Pre Event Packages:

This category will be focused on the theme of transition to mobile services in comparison to online services. There will be 8 awards under this category as following
